code-runner.executorMap.c: clear && cd $dir && gcc $fileName -o $fileNameWithoutExt && cat .vscode/input | ./$fileNameWithoutExt > .vscode/output && echo ----done---- && rm ./$fileNameWithoutExt
code-runner.executorMap.cpp: clear && cd $dir && g++ $fileName -o $fileNameWithoutExt && cat .vscode/input | ./$fileNameWithoutExt > .vscode/output && echo ----done---- && rm ./$fileNameWithoutExt

code-runner.customCommand: clear && cd $dir && g++ $fileName -o test.exe && cat .vscode/input | ./test.exe > .vscode/output && echo ----done---- && rm ./test.exe
